title:
On finite-dimensional homogeneous Lie algebras of derivations of
  polynomial rings
authors: Ivan Arzhantsev, Sergey Gaifullin, and Viktor Lopatkin
abstract:
For a finite set of homogeneous locally nilpotent derivations of the algebra
of polynomials in several variables, a finite dimensionality criterion for the
Lie algebra generated by these derivations is known. Also the structure of the
corresponding finite-dimensional Lie algebras is described in previous works.
In this paper, we obtain a finite dimensionality criterion for a Lie algebra
generated by a finite set of homogeneous derivations, each of which is not
locally nilpotent.
